Name: Toy Tactics
About the game: Toy Tactics is a physics-enhanced RTS where you can sketch unit formations and direct wobbly toys to victory. Under the guidance of legendary generals, master the ability to draw configurations into the battlefield and send miniature legions to war against hordes of undead foes. Load up your army with artifacts and destructive spells to help smash quirky enemies in real-time. Think fast, deploy your units strategically, and lead them to victory! Battle Toy Troops Combat skeletal dinosaurs, spooky necromancers and stealthy samurai. Don’t let their outer toy shell deceive you, these bloodthirsty baddies want you to face a wobbly destruction. Battles take place in many types of scenarios and terrains, so expect the unexpected. Draw & Conquer Freeze the game action and draw simple formations to charge, encircle, and even chase down your enemies. Send them marching forward in wacky patterns, a straight line, or surround and protect your commander. When it comes to moving your allies, only your imagination is the limit. The battlefield is a canvas, and you are its artist. Hilarious Physics Helmets are sure to roll. Watch your toy units bobble, fight, and get flung across the battlefield. Send structures flying and castle walls crumbling. Witness the chaos and destruction unfold in a most epic fashion as the field is flooded with scenes of combat. Learn Powerful Spells Unlock spells and unleash them while fighting to turn the tide of battle in your favor. Defeat enemies to charge up your power, then summon reinforcement catapults, quickly construct medical tents to heal allies, or drop flaming meteors onto the heads of your foes. Features: A physics-based RTS game with a unique drawing system. Many unit types with strengths and weaknesses. Magical spells to blow enemies away (literally). Whimsical destruction system that sends foes flying. Accessible to players of all experience levels. The world is yours to play with. The only limit is your own imagination! Whether you’re a hardcore strategist or a casual tactician, Toy Tactics offers a unique gameplay experience for every type of player. So gear up, draw your formations, and lead your toy troops to victory.
